product_name: Marmot Ether DriClime Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: An ultralight wind-resistant hoodie with mesh vents, the women's Ether DriClime Jacket from Marmot is just the layer you need on runs, climb or hikes that turn breezy and nippy. Nylon fabric is wind- and water-resistant, and breathable; durable water repellent finish causes drizzle to bead up and roll off. DriClime(R) bi-component wicking lining keeps you feeling dry and comfortable. Hood can be rolled up; mesh vents enhance breathability. Hand pockets have concealed zippers; internal zip pocket secures essentials. Women's Marmot Ether DriClime Jacket packs into its own pocket. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) allows nonbinding, full-range motion. Reflective logos; elastic cuffs; elastic drawcord hem. Closeout.
short_description: An ultralight wind-resistant hoodie with mesh vents, the women's Ether DriClime Jacket from Marmot is just the layer you need on runs, climb or hikes that turn breezy and nippy.
